data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Takemoto, Takuya (2019): Revision of the genus Zeugophora (Coleoptera, Megalopodidae, Zeugophorinae) in Japan. Zootaxa 4644 (1): 1-62, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4644.1.1|236 occurrences
